meanings.sent1: The soup was slurpier than the stew.
meanings.sent2: The slurpier drink was more refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: He made a slurpier sound than a hungry puppy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a slurpier melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The slurpier ice cream melted quickly in the sun.

meanings.sent1: The slurpier noodles were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent2: She preferred the slurpier smoothie over the chunky one.
meanings.sent3: The slurpier the drink, the happier he became.
meanings.sent4: The slurpier clouds seemed to promise rain.
meanings.sent5: The slurpier sauce added a burst of flavor to the dish.
